word_group.brief_definition: 整形外科
心脏手术；心脏外科手术；心脏病手术
开心手术；心内直视手术
当日手术；日间手术
小切口手术；微创手术
器官移植手术
整容手术；美容外科；整容外科
根治手术；根治术；根治手术疗效
颌面外科；颌面外科手术；颌面外科学
激光手术；激光外科手术；雷射手术
大脑手术；脑部手术；颅脑手术
紧急手术；急诊手术；急救手术
颈部手术；头颈外科；颈外科学
眼部手术；眼科手术；眼睛手术
膝盖手术；膝部手术；膝关节手术
做手术
手术患者；外科手术病人；外科病人
细胞减数外科；（肿瘤细胞）减灭术
小手术
髋关节手术；髋部手术

bilingual.target: 他的外科手术非常成功。
他需要进行一次外科手术。
她对外科手术非常感兴趣。

bilingual.source: He decided to specialize in hepatobiliary surgery.
The surgery doctor works in the operating room.
bilingual.target: 外科医生在手术室里工作。

bilingual.source: The surgeon has excellent skill in surgery.
bilingual.target: 这位医生的外科手法非常精湛。
这位外科医生专门从事颅部手术。

bilingual.source: She needs surgery to repair her broken leg.
bilingual.target: 她需要外科手术来修复她的断腿。
这位外科医生专门从事血管手术。

bilingual.source: He has worked in hepatobiliary surgery for ten years.
bilingual.target: 他在肝胆外科工作了十年。

yingyinNormal.en: After I successfully removed your baby, I called for the Chief of Surgery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 成功取出婴儿后，我叫来了外科主任。

yingyinNormal.en: And using a fork to pick up a piece of broccoli from a Styrofoam plate without driving the fork through the plate is going to be as difficult as brain surgery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 此外， 用餐叉从一个泡沫塑料盘子里叉起一块西兰花而不叉透盘子，这难度将不亚于脑外科手术。

yingyinNormal.en: Is he okay? He's still in surgery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他没事吧？还在做手术。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I'm gonna get the surgery, it's no big deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我要做这个手术，不用大惊小怪。

yingyinNormal.en: The thing about surgery is, once you're in, you're in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 手术一旦开始，就不能停下。

yingyinNormal.en: An annulment? Ross. I don't think surgery's the answer here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 切除？罗斯，我想手术可解决不了问题。

yingyinNormal.en: You have surgery today?
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天有手术吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I have this wrinkle here from your first surgery. I have these wrinkles here from your last surgery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你第一次手术时我长了这条皱纹。最后一次手术时我长了这些皱纹。

yingyinNormal.en: How is it my fault? I told you not to get the surgery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么是我的错？我告诉你别去做手术了。

yingyinNormal.en: He's short-sighted, or he was. His recent laser surgery has done the trick. Laser surgery? Look at his clothes, he's made an effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是近视眼，或者曾经是。最近做了激光手术治好了。激光手术？看他的衣服，打扮很用心。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, wait, wait. You had surgery? Yes, and Sheldon sent me flowers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，你动过手术？是的，谢尔顿还送了花。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'm thinking I'll probably start with that laser eye surgery too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我打算先去做激光眼科手术。

yingyinNormal.en: You ever thought about having plastic surgery? No, I've never thought about it. Why? Dude, this is after plastic surgery! It takes a lotta work to look this good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想过做整容手术吗？没，从来没想过，为什么要做？老兄，我已经整过容了！要整很多次才能这么帅的。

yingyinNormal.en: Just before the surgery, I asked my parents if I could buy a really nice suit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就在手术之前，我问爸妈能不能买一套高档西服。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, let's talk about something other than the surgery. That's a good idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我们聊点手术以外的事情吧。好主意。

yingyinNormal.en: And I thought the surgery itself was the only thing I had to be concerned about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我之前还以为这手术本身是我唯一需要注意的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: Like me. No, you just had a major abdominal surgery. You're gonna stay right here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如我。不行，你刚做过腹部手术，你要留在这。

yingyinNormal.en: Why would you have surgery? Because I can't breathe. I snore, I get sinus infections.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要做手术？因为我呼吸不顺，打呼，还会鼻窦发炎。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, first of all, the surgery was a success, and secondly, I didn't even want you there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，手术非常成功，其次，我根本不想要你去。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I'm sorry I didn't tell you about the surgery, but you were worried about nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我为没告诉你手术的事道歉，但你根本是瞎操心。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Also, individuals recovering from <highlight>surgery</highlight> or an injury can also benefit from extra protein.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，从手术或受伤中恢复的人也可以从额外的蛋白质中受益。

examination_example.sentence: Are you recovering from injury or <highlight>surgery</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你正在受伤或手术的恢复期吗？

examination_example.sentence: Is <highlight>surgery</highlight>, radiation or careful monitoring best for prostate cancer?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 手术、放射治疗或仔细监测对前列腺癌最有效吗？

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Americans spend billions of dollars each year trying to change their weight with diets, gym memberships and plastic <highlight>surgery</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人每年花费数十亿美元试图通过节食、健身和整形手术来改变体重。

examination_example.sentence: Undergoing plastic <highlight>surgeries</highlight> in pursuit of beauty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了追求美丽而接受整形手术。

examination_example.sentence: A girl in New Mexico has raised more than $500 for her little brother who needs heart <highlight>surgery</highlight> in Houston, Texas, this July.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年7月，新墨西哥州的一位女孩在德克萨斯州休斯顿为需要心脏手术的弟弟筹集了 500 多美元。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: Wu Mengchao, the “Father of Chinese Hepatobiliary <highlight>Surgery</highlight> (肝胆外科) ”, focused on saving people's lives for nearly eighty years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 吴，这位“中国肝胆外科之父”，近八十年来专注于挽救人的生命。

examination_example.sentence: The pain isn't felt most of the time in dental <highlight>surgeries</highlight>（牙科手术）．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在牙科手术中，大部分时间感觉不到疼痛。

examination_example.sentence: How does the writer explain that the pain isn't felt most of the time in dental <highlight>surgeries</highlight>？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者如何解释在牙科手术的大部分时间感觉不到疼痛？
